account_sid.description: The Twilio account SID of the conversation participant.

conversation_sid.description: The SID of the conversation the participant belongs to.

sid.description: The unique SID of the conversation participant.

identity.description: The identity of the participant in the conversation.

attributes.description: Additional attributes related to the conversation participant.

messaging_binding.description: Details about the messaging binding for the conversation participant.

type.description: The type of the messaging binding (e.g., SMS, email).

address.description: The address associated with the participant's messaging binding.

proxy_address.description: The proxy address for the messaging binding.

role_sid.description: The SID of the role assigned to the participant in the conversation.

date_created.description: The date and time when the conversation participant was created.

date_updated.description: The date and time when the conversation participant was last updated.

url.description: The URL for accessing more details about the conversation participant.

last_read_message_index.description: The index of the last message that the participant has read.

last_read_timestamp.description: The timestamp when the participant last read a message.
